description:
REVOLVEclothing iPhone App

A one-stop shop for all things style and fashion, REVOLVEclothing.com 
offers an unrivaled collection of over 500 of the world’s most coveted 
women’s and men’s brands and provides the highest quality 
click-and-mortar shopping experience 

Now you can shop REVOLVEclothing.com from wherever you are with our new, 
easy-to-use app! From browsing the latest new arrivals to discovering 
emerging brands and trends, the REVOLVE iPhone app is your singular 
source for staying stylish on the go. 

 Features: 

- Effortless shopping wherever you are - Browse by Brand, Category, Trend, Denim Shop & more - Shop New Arrivals before they sell out 
- Share your favorite finds via E-mail, Facebook & Twitter
 
Download the REVOLVEclothing app to shop now 

To shop the full website or for more information, visit www.revolveclothing.com
releaseNotes:
You guys! We gave our app a little makeover so you can make over your closet a little easier. This is what we changed:
• Shopping overseas? You may now pre-pay Duties & Taxes
• Need some ideas? Product recommendations are available on product detail pages 
• Want more alerts? Our push notifications are being sent your way, just the way you want them
• Did you upgrade your device to iOS8? This app is now compatible.
